citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
* A facility representative was not available on 8/2/16 at 10:30 AM to do a facility inspection.
* Upon arrival to the site to do a facility inspection, the licensee stated that they were just leaving for a scheduled
appointment. The licensee stated that they did not know what time they would be arriving home.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
Additional Inspectors
Depoe Angela, Animal Care Inspector

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
*  A facility representative was not available on 8/2/16 at  10:30 AM to do a facility inspection.
*   Upon arrival to the site to do a facility inspection,  the licensee stated that they were just leaving for a scheduled
appointment.  The licensee stated that they did not know what time they would be arriving home.
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
Additional Inspectors
Depoe Angela, Animal Care Inspector
